item.title: TSB Unisex boots
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
• Upper: brushed leather and nylon
  • Metal eyelets and laces
  • Removable nylon pouch
  • Enameled metal triangle logo
  • Light rubber lug tread sole
  • Sole height: 60 mm

  • MATERIALS

    Fabric/Leather

item.title: TSB Chinese Female Heels
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
• Give your onlookers something to talk about when you flaunt your chic look in the Chinese LaundryÂ® Rumor sandal!
  • Available in a variety of upper materials.
  • Please note: upper material is listed in the color name.
  • Ankle strap with adjustable buckle closure.
  • Open-toe silhouette.

item.title: TSB Boot Brushed leather/ rubber sole
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Traditionally used in fine classic footwear, brushed leather has been one of the iconic materials of the brand since the '90s and is used herein a pair of Chelsea boots with a light rubber sole. New, contemporary elegance with sleek, clean lines defines Prada footwear for men.
  • Product code: 2TE168_055_F0002
  • Light rubber sole with notched welt
  • Crepe-like half-sole
  • 40 mm heel
  • Leather insole
  • 0

  • MATERIALS

    Fabric/Leather/rubber
